name: DiagnosticReport.media.comment
title: DiagnosticReport.media.comment
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: A comment about the image. Typically, this is used to provide an explanation for why the image is included, or to draw the viewer's attention to important features.
element.comment: The comment should be displayed with the image. It would be common for the report to include additional discussion of the image contents in other sections such as the conclusion.
element.requirements: The provider of the report should make a comment about each image included in the report.
